transcripts.text: Hello, my name is Thea.  I'm 15 years old and I'm a climate fighter from Denmark.  We are in a climate emergency.  Children all over the world have been using their valuable time to strike for the climate.  And now we need your help.  I'm asking you to leave a comment on the video you're about to watch, addressing the YouTuber to take action.  Use the hashtag climate strike and link to the creator's global strike net.  We need this YouTuber to raise awareness about the global strike.  Can you help us?
